Welcome to MobilTárca! TOUCH HERE TO EXPLORE OUR CATALOG AND ADD YOUR FIRST CARD TO MOBILTÁRCA. MobilTárca Card MAKE YOUR FIRST PAYMENT WITH MOBILTÁRCA CARD ADD TO MobilTárca FAST AND SECURE PAYMENTS WITH YOUR PHONE Mobile payments directly from your bank account Add new service MobilTárca View in external browser INSTALL PARTNER APP You will be redirected to Google Play Store where you can download the partner app. LAUNCH PARTNER APP You will be redirected to an external app. YOU ARE LEAVING THE APP Continue Do not show this again. Activate NFC Please turn on NFC in the settings of your phone to pay with this card. TURN ON We noticed that NFC is turned off on your phone. In order to use your Fast Card, you need to turn on NFC in the settings of your phone. Thank you Activate Fast Card Call Customer Service To the Website How do I pay with my phone? Pay with this card without unlocking your phone Opening hours: %1$s Delete card View card details Edit card View stamp card details
Select your card to pay. Hold the back of your phone against the payment terminal. Done! Tap the \'PAY NOW\' button and wait while we prepare your card for payment. Once the spinner turns green, hold the back of your phone against the payment terminal. Your phone will vibrate once the card details have been sent to the terminal. And that’s it! You only need to enter your payment card PIN (provided by your card issuer) directly at the payment terminal for transactions over € 25.
ACTIVATE FAST CARD Open the menu on the details page of your card. Or simply tap on TURN ON below. We will activate your %1$s for you. Simply turn on the slider. Or simply tap on TURN ON below. We will activate your %1$s for you. TURN ON
Preparing your phone for payment… Hold the back of your phone against the payment terminal. Cancels
You can now pay with your smartphone! To further protect your payment card, you can setup a custom 4-digit MobilTárca PIN. You can always change your MobilTárca PIN in the \'Settings\' section later. SETUP MOBILTÁRCA PIN
Home Settings FAQ About Data privacy
Settings Change MobilTárca PIN
ACTIVATE NFC We noticed that you have activated a Fast Card, but NFC is turned off on your phone. In order to use your FastCard, you need to turn on NFC in the settings of your phone. TURN ON
SET MOBILTÁRCA AS DEFAULT We noticed that MobilTárca is not set as the default payment app in Android settings. In order to pay with MobilTárca, you need to change the settings. MAKE MOBILTÁRCA DEFAULT REARRANGE YOUR CARDS You can easily rearrange your cards below. Simply long-press on a card, move it to the desired position, and drop it. PAY WITHOUT UNLOCKING YOUR PHONE Do you want to activate your %1$s for paying faster in stores? LEARN MORE TURN ON

Coupon supplied by Magyar Telekom Plc. USE ALL COUPONS Directions to the store
WELCOME TO MOBILTÁRCA MobilTárca turns your smartphone into a digital wallet. ADD YOUR PHYSICAL CARDS Store your coupons, loyalty cards, in the near future, payment cards and more in one place. ADD YOUR PHYSICAL CARDS Store your loyalty cards, coupons and more in one place. PAY IN STORES You are be able to look for the contactless symbol and pay with one touch. Quick and easy. SECURE WITH TELEKOM Your data is stored securely on the SIM and is protected by multiple layers of security. SAVE MONEY Discover coupons and use them with ease to get discounts. GET STARTED TODAY Get MobilTárca and leave your plastic cards at home. GET STARTED By proceeding, you accept the %1$s and %2$s of Magyar Telekom Plc. T&Cs Data Privacy guidelines
Oops We are experiencing a problem with our backend systems. We are working on it and will have things back to normal shortly. No Internet connection Please check your Internet connection and try again.
ADD CARD TODO Use this service THIS CARD HAS BEEN ADDED Register for this card You need a NFC SIM from Deutsche Telekom to use this card PLEASE INSERT A TELEKOM NFC SIM PLEASE INSERT A NFC SIM You need a NFC-compatible SIM to use this card. You can change your SIM card at any Telekom Shop for free. HANDSET NOT NFC-READY You need a NFC-compatible Android handset to use this card. Browse compatible devices at our website and get your new handset delivered to your door. HANDSET NOT COMPATIBLE Your handset does not support this service. Browse compatible devices at our website and get your new handset delivered to your door. GO TO WEBSITE GET TICKET
To access MobilTárca Catalog, connect to a Wi-Fi or cellular data network. CAN\'T FIND YOUR LOYALTY CARD HERE? Add any loyalty card to MobilTárca by scanning the barcode. PAYMENT LOYALTY TRANSPORT ACCESS TICKETING DIGITAL STAMPS
Add a card Scan card bar code Place your cards bar code inside the viewfinder to scan it. Enter card number manually Add card details Edit card details Loyalty Card name Loyalty Card number Please enter the card name and card number Please enter the card name Please enter the card number To add a loyalty card, connect to a Wi-Fi or cellular data network. Delete card Are you sure you want to delete this card? Do you need help? USING LOYALTY CARDS IN STORES To use your loyalty cards, simply show the barcode code of your digital card to the cashier - the displayed code can be directly scanned.\n\nIn case the store does not support scanning of barcodes from smartphones, you can ask the cashier to manually enter the displayed card number into the cashier system. To use your loyalty cards, ask the cashier to manually enter the displayed card number into the cashier system. Please enter a valid card number. Additional card info ADD A PHOTO OF YOUR CARD CHANGE YOUR CARD PHOTO Pan and zoom to reposition the photo in the tile Reposition photo Pan and zoom to reposition your photo in the tile. DONE Take a photo of your card Place your card inside the square and press the button below when ready. TAKE PHOTO The entered text is too long. Please enter a maximum of %1$s characters. Done Take a photo of your card Reposition photo

The collection code you have scanned could not be validated, please try again later. To collect or redeem stamps, connect to a Wi-Fi or cellular data network. NFC Code was not identified Please try again Scan to redeem Scan the QR code to redeem reward Unable to redeem reward The redemption code you have scanned could not be validated, please try again later. This reward will be available a few more minutes. REWARD REDEEMED To redeem your reward, connect to a Wi-Fi or cellular data network. The scanned code is not valid. The code that you scanned is for collecting stamps. Please, scan a code to redeem your reward. The code that you scanned is for redeeming rewards. Please, scan a code to collect stamps. Reward was successfully redeemed.

PLEASE ALLOW CAMERA ACCESS Please allow access to the camera. You will be able to scan your physical cards and add them easily to MobilTárca. ALLOW ACCESS PLEASE ALLOW CALENDAR ACCESS Please allow MyWallet to access your calendar. We will save the event in your calendar. ALLOW ACCESS
